1.0.name: wordpress/multisite-global-search
1.0.description:
Easily search through all blogs into your WordPress Multisite by post title, post content or post author. Multisite Global Search doesn't work with single WordPress installation and it must be activated for all sites using "network activate" in the Administration Panel. Currently in the following languages:

  • English
  • German (de_DE) by Dennis Vorpahl
  • French (fr_FR) by Fabrice Perrinel
  • Norwegian Bokmal (nb_NO) by Tore Johnny Bråtveit
  • Portuguese (pt_PT) by Jose Anjos
  • Russian (ru_RU) by Sam Savinov
  • Romanian (ro_RO) by Alexander Ovsov Web Geek Science
  • Slovak (sk_SK) by Branco WebHostingGeeks.com
  • Spanish (es_ES)

If you have created your own language pack, or have an update of an existing one, you can send gettext .po and .mo files t
